Package io.micronaut.guides.core

Interface MacroSubstitution

All Superinterfaces:
io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered
All Known Implementing Classes:
BuildDiffLinkSubstitution, BuildMacroExclusion, CalloutMacroSubstitution, CliMacroSubstitution, CommonMacroSubstitution, DependencyMacroSubstitution, ExternalMacroSubstitution, ExternalTemplateMacroSubstitution, FeaturesMacroSubstitution, FeaturesWordsMacroSubstitution, GuideLinkMacroSubstitution, JdkLowerThanMacroExclusion, LanguageMacroExclusion, LineReplacementMacroSubstitution, PlaceholderMacroSubstitution, RawTestMacroSubstitution, ResourceMacroSubstitution, SourceMacroSubstitution, TestMacroSubstitution, TestResourceMacroSubstitution, ZipIncludeMacroSubstitution
public interface MacroSubstitution extends io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered
MacroSubstitution is an interface that defines methods for substituting macros in Asciidoc files.
